refnamediv.refpurpose: 内部結果ポインタを次の結果に移動する

refsect1.title: 説明
refsect1.para: When sending more than one SQL statement to the server or executing a stored procedure with multiple results will cause the server to return multiple result sets. This function will test for additional results available form the server. if an additional result set exists it will free the existing result set and prepare to fetch the wors from the new result set. The function will return &true; if an additional result set was available or &false; othervise.

example.title: fbsql_next_result example
example.programlisting:
<?php
    $link = fbsql_connect ("localhost", "_SYSTEM", "secret");
    fbsql_select_db("MyDB", $link);
    $SQL = "Select * from table1; select * from table2;";
    $rs = fbsql_query($SQL, $link);
    do {
        while ($row = fbsql_fetch_row($rs)) {
        }
    } while (fbsql_next_result($rs));
    fbsql_free_result($rs);
    fbsql_close ($link);
?>
